title: Looking for hedera/aldus leaf...
content:
I saw someone wearing a silver pendant with the hedera/aldus leaf dingbat and was looking for any information when I found this site, which helped me put a name to the design.

I am hoping there is someone in this design forum who may have seen this and can help me find it as a gift. I’ve seen the shape used in books and such and it’s lovely.

Thanks in advance for your help,  
L

 [‹ Helvetica DVD extra #2: Wim Crouwel on his "Proposal for a New Alphabet"](http://web.archive.org/web/20071223163111/http:/typophile.com/node/36200 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fonts: Hoard or Prune? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071223163111/http:/typophile.com/node/36173 "Go to next forum topic")
author: LST

comments.content:
I think he means typophile.

I have never seen such a thing but maybe someone else here has.

I haven’t seen one but I think that would be a great addition to Typophiles merchandise.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071223163111im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hedera_5110.gif)
